DESCRIPTION:
Plague Inc. is a strategy-simulation game in which the player controls a plague which has infected patient zero. The player must choose between various plagues and viruses, and infect and kill the whole world population by evolving the plague and adapting to various environments. However, there is a time pressure to complete the game before humans, the opponent, develop a cure for the plague.[7] The exception to this rule is the games version of a zombie plague in which if you evolve the symptom cypopathic reanimation it will eliminate the chance that the cure will effect anything except for high score.

Installation instructions:
1. Execute the .exe file.
2. Follow the instructions.
3. Enjoy the program.
